001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
004import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
005import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
008import org.openqa.selenium.JavascriptExecutor;
009import org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchWindowException;
010
011/**
012 * A fluent service class for handling navigation-related actions in a web automation framework.
013 *
014 * <p>Provides methods to navigate between pages, handle browser tabs/windows, interact with frames, and manage alerts.
015 *
016 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents the UI service fluent implementation that extends {@link UiServiceFluent},
017 * allowing method chaining for seamless interaction.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "unchecked"})
022public class NavigationServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> {
023
024   private final T uiServiceFluent;
025   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
026
027   /**
028    * Constructs a new {@code NavigationServiceFluent} instance.
029    *
030    * @param uiServiceFluent The parent fluent UI service instance.
031    * @param webDriver       The smart web driver used for navigation actions.
032    */
033   public NavigationServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, SmartWebDriver webDriver) {
034      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
035      this.driver = webDriver;
036   }
037
038   /**
039    * Navigates to the specified URL and maximizes the browser window.
040    *
041    * @param url The URL to navigate to.
042    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
043    */
044   public T navigate(String url) {
045      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Navigate to the URL and maximize the browser window");
046
047      driver.manage().window().maximize();
048      driver.get(url);
049      return uiServiceFluent;
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Navigates back in the browser history.
054    *
055    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
056    */
057   public T back() {
058      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Navigate back in the browser history");
059
060      driver.navigate().back();
061      return uiServiceFluent;
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Navigates forward in the browser history.
066    *
067    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
068    */
069   public T forward() {
070      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Navigate forward in the browser history");
071
072      driver.navigate().forward();
073      return uiServiceFluent;
074   }
075
076   /**
077    * Refreshes the current page.
078    *
079    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
080    */
081   public T refresh() {
082      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Refresh the current page");
083
084      driver.navigate().refresh();
085      return uiServiceFluent;
086   }
087
088   /**
089    * Switches to a newly opened browser tab.
090    *
091    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
092    */
093   public T switchToNewTab() {
094      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Switch to a newly opened browser tab");
095
096      String currentHandle = driver.getWindowHandle();
097      for (String handle : driver.getWindowHandles()) {
098         if (!handle.equals(currentHandle)) {
099            driver.switchTo().window(handle);
100            break;
101         }
102      }
103      return uiServiceFluent;
104   }
105
106   /**
107    * Switches to a browser window with the specified title.
108    *
109    * @param windowTitle The title of the target window.
110    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
111    * @throws NoSuchWindowException if no window with the given title is found.
112    */
113   public T switchToWindow(String windowTitle) {
114      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Switch to the browser window with the title: " + windowTitle);
115
116      for (String handle : driver.getWindowHandles()) {
117         driver.switchTo().window(handle);
118         if (Objects.equals(driver.getTitle(), windowTitle)) {
119            return uiServiceFluent;
120         }
121      }
122      throw new NoSuchWindowException("No window found with title: " + windowTitle);
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Closes the current browser tab and switches to another available tab if present.
127    *
128    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
129    */
130   public T closeCurrentTab() {
131      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Close the current browser tab");
132
133      driver.close();
134      if (!driver.getWindowHandles().isEmpty()) {
135         driver.switchTo().window(driver.getWindowHandles().iterator().next());
136      }
137      return uiServiceFluent;
138   }
139
140   /**
141    * Switches to an iframe using its index.
142    *
143    * @param index The index of the iframe.
144    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
145    */
146   public T switchToFrameByIndex(int index) {
147      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Switch to the iframe using index: " + index);
148
149      driver.switchTo().frame(index);
150      return uiServiceFluent;
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Switches to an iframe using its name or ID.
155    *
156    * @param nameOrId The name or ID of the iframe.
157    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
158    */
159   public T switchToFrameByNameOrId(String nameOrId) {
160      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Switch to the iframe using name or ID: " + nameOrId);
161
162      driver.switchTo().frame(nameOrId);
163      return uiServiceFluent;
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Switches to the parent frame of the current iframe.
168    *
169    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
170    */
171   public T switchToParentFrame() {
172      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Switch to the parent frame");
173
174      driver.switchTo().parentFrame();
175      return uiServiceFluent;
176   }
177
178   /**
179    * Switches back to the default content from an iframe.
180    *
181    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
182    */
183   public T switchToDefaultContent() {
184      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Switch back to the default content from the iframe");
185
186      driver.switchTo().defaultContent();
187      return uiServiceFluent;
188   }
189
190   /**
191    * Accepts an alert pop-up.
192    *
193    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
194    */
195   public T acceptAlert() {
196      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Accept the alert pop-up");
197
198      driver.switchTo().alert().accept();
199      return uiServiceFluent;
200   }
201
202   /**
203    * Dismisses an alert pop-up.
204    *
205    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
206    */
207   public T dismissAlert() {
208      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Dismiss the alert pop-up");
209
210      driver.switchTo().alert().dismiss();
211      return uiServiceFluent;
212   }
213
214   /**
215    * Retrieves the text of an alert pop-up.
216    *
217    * @return The text of the alert.
218    */
219   private String getAlertText() {
220      return driver.switchTo().alert().getText();
221   }
222
223   /**
224    * Validates that the alert text matches the expected value.
225    *
226    * @param expected The expected alert text.
227    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
228    */
229   public T validateAlertText(String expected) {
230      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Validate that the alert text matches the expected value");
231
232      return validateAlertText(expected, false);
233   }
234
235   /**
236    * Validates that the alert text matches the expected value, with an optional soft assertion.
237    *
238    * @param expected The expected alert text.
239    * @param soft     If {@code true}, the validation will be performed softly.
240    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
241    */
242   public T validateAlertText(String expected, boolean soft) {
243      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Validate alert text with expected value: " + expected);
244
245      String alertText = getAlertText();
246      if (soft) {
247         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
248               softAssertions -> softAssertions.assertThat(alertText).as("Validating Alert text")
249                     .isEqualTo(expected));
250      } else {
251         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
252               () -> Assertions.assertThat(alertText).as("Validating Alert text")
253                     .isEqualTo(expected));
254      }
255   }
256
257   /**
258    * Opens a new browser tab using JavaScript and switches to it.
259    *
260    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
261    */
262   @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "BC_UNCONFIRMED_CAST")
263   public T openNewTab() {
264      Allure.step("[UI - Navigation] Open a new browser tab using JavaScript and switch to it");
265
266      ((JavascriptExecutor) driver).executeScript("window.open();");
267      return switchToNewTab();
268   }
269
270}
